message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take $60, you take $40.  It's important to reach a deal quickly!
I think we can both do better than that.  Let's split it more evenly. I'll take $55 and you get $45.  It's a good starting point for us to work from.
Bob, time is money, and it's literally losing value!  My turn, I'll take $58, you get $42. Let's close this deal before inflation eats our profits!
